vocabulary.en_sentence: The problem of global warming is getting worse and worse.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 全球暖化的問題愈來愈惡化。

vocabulary.en_sentence: Our Earth is in the shape of a globe.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 我們的地球是個球體。

vocabulary.en_sentence: One of Jane’s favorite novels is The Da Vinci Code.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 珍最喜歡的小說之一是《達文西密碼》。

vocabulary.en_sentence: Dan Brown, who wrote the book The Da Vinci Code, is a world-famous novelist.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 《達文西密碼》的作者丹‧布朗，是世界知名小說家。

vocabulary.en_sentence: Can I have a beef sandwich instead of a cheeseburger?
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 我可以吃牛肉三明治，而不要起司漢堡嗎？

vocabulary.en_sentence: I’ve only read the story in Chinese translation.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 我只有讀過那個故事的中文譯本。

vocabulary.en_sentence: Ted didn’t understand French, so I offered to translate.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 泰德不懂法文，所以我自願為他翻譯。

vocabulary.en_sentence: Careful listening is the key to good communication.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 仔細傾聽是良好溝通的關鍵。

vocabulary.en_sentence: In the movie, Dr. Dolittle can communicate with animals.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 在這部電影裡，杜立德醫生能與動物溝通。

vocabulary.en_sentence: The company has lost two billion dollars in the market.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 該公司已在市場損失二十億元。

vocabulary.en_sentence: The population of Taiwan is about 23 ,000,000.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 臺灣的人口大約為二千三百萬。

vocabulary.en_sentence: Lack of parking space is a major traffic problem in many cities.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 缺乏停車位是許多城市的主要交通問題。

vocabulary.en_sentence: What’s your major?
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 你的主修科目為何？

vocabulary.en_sentence: I major in computer science.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 我主修電腦科學。

vocabulary.en_sentence: There is no perfect system of government in the world.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 世上沒有完美的行政系統。

vocabulary.en_sentence:
1.He received a good education, and got a well-paid job.
2.Linda chose to major in education in college because she wanted to become a schoolteacher.
vocabulary.cn_sentence:
1. 他受良好的教育，並找到一份高薪的工作。
2. 琳達選擇在大學主修教育因為她想成為學校老師

vocabulary.en_sentence: The government is trying to educate people about the dangers of drunk driving.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 政府正試著教育民眾酒醉駕車的危害性。

vocabulary.en_sentence: Although Rick lives next to a convenience store, he hardly goes there.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 雖然瑞克住在便利商店隔壁，他幾乎不去那兒。

vocabulary.en_sentence: Just imagine what you could do with one billion dollars.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 想像一下你能拿十億元做什麼。

vocabulary.en_sentence:
1. It takes a wonderful imagination to write such an interesting ghost story.
2. Imagination is very important if you want to be a writer.
vocabulary.cn_sentence:
1. 寫出如此有趣的鬼故事需要奇妙的想像力。
2. 如果你想要當作家，想像力是很重要的。

vocabulary.en_sentence:
Let’s meet at the school’s main entrance at seven o’clock
tomorrow morning.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 我們明早七點在學校大門碰面吧。

vocabulary.en_sentence: CNN, ABC, and Time Magazine are important news media.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: CNN、ABC 以及《時代雜誌》是重要的新聞媒體。

vocabulary.en_sentence: Nike and Adidas are two famous international sports businesses.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 耐吉與愛迪達是兩家知名的國際運動企業。

vocabulary.en_sentence:
1.Sixty percent of the teachers in our school are male.
2.Twenty percent of the money belongs to us.
vocabulary.cn_sentence:
1. 我們學校百分之六十的老師是男的。
2. 百分之二十的錢屬於我們。

vocabulary.en_sentence: What is the percentage of foreign students in your school?
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 你們學校外籍學生的比例是多少？

vocabulary.en_sentence: Feel free to ask me if you need any further information.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 如果需要更進一步的資訊，請儘管問我。

vocabulary.en_sentence: They don’t open on Mondays. Thus, don’t go there on Monday.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 他們週一不開門，所以週一不要去。

vocabulary.en_sentence:
1.The subway connects with the high-speed rail at this station.
2.The Manhattan Bridge connects Lower Manhattan with Brooklyn.
vocabulary.cn_sentence:
1. 地鐵在此站連結高鐵。
2. 曼哈頓大橋連接下曼哈頓與布   魯克林。

vocabulary.en_sentence: Because of a poor telephone connection, I couldn’t hear Sam clearly.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 由於電話線路收訊不佳，我聽不清楚山姆說什麼。

vocabulary.en_sentence: Not every researcher agrees that boys do better in math than girls.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 並非每位研究者都同意男生的數學比女生好。

vocabulary.en_sentence:
1. The scientists will research into why so many people got sick in such a short time.
2. I need to research his proposition before I make any decision.
vocabulary.cn_sentence:
1. 這些科學家將研究為何這麼多人在這麼短期間內染病。
2. 我得先研究一下他的提議，然後才做決定。

vocabulary.en_sentence: It’s smart to do some research before you start a business.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 創業之前，做點研究是聰明的。

vocabulary.en_sentence: Stir-frying is a means of Chinese cooking.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 炒菜是中華料理的一種方式。

vocabulary.en_sentence:
1. To some degree, I agree with what Lisa said. 
2. Jerry’s car looks very new, but in fact, it is second-hand.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 某種程度上來說，我同意莉莎所說的話。

vocabulary.en_sentence: My roommate Charlie is in fact my tennis partner and best friend.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 傑瑞的車看起來非常新，但事實上，它是二手的。

vocabulary.en_sentence: The early bird gets the worm. For example, if you book your ticket earlier, you will get a better seat.
vocabulary.cn_sentence: 早起的鳥兒有蟲吃。譬如說，早一點兒訂票，座位會比較好。
